attributes.action: abolish the t.v. licence fee, and make all t.v either commercial or pay per view
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all telly should be either commercial, or pay per view, it is about time the outmoded licence fee was abolished, why should we fund the bbc so that the chief exec can be paid hundreds of thousands of pounds for nothing

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
